entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
